content: Chapter 4 of Black Myth: Wukong features a total of 15 Bosses you can fight in the **The Webbed Hollow**. There are 13 Yaoguai Chiefs (including one not listed in your journal, and 5 that are not fought but have their own journal listing), 5 Yaoguai Kings, and 2 Character Bosses that you'll be able to encounter, including 3 Secret Bosses.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Boss_List.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Boss List'.
The content is as follows:
Chapter 4 of Black Myth: Wukong features a total of 15 Bosses you can fight in the **The Webbed Hollow**. There are 13 Yaoguai Chiefs (including one not listed in your journal, and 5 that are not fought but have their own journal listing), 5 Yaoguai Kings, and 2 Character Bosses that you'll be able to encounter, including 3 Secret Bosses.
